this_title: Chris Packham: 7.7 Billion People and Counting
trans_title: BBC.地平线.2020.从七十七亿人口开始
introduction: According to the UN, it is predicted that the human population could reach ten billion people by the year 2050. For broadcaster and naturalist Chris Packham, who has dedicated his life to championing the natural world, the subject of our growing population and the impact it is having on our planet is one of the most vital – and often overlooked – topics of discussion in an era ...

foreign_title: Chris Packham: 7.7 Billion People and Counting
